     build-essential \
     curl \
     poppler-utils \
+    tesseract-ocr \
+    tesseract-ocr-eng \

     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
 
 # Copy project files

===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -13,12 +13,12 @@
 
 # Copy project files
 COPY . .
 
-# Install the package in editable mode
-RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -e ".[dev]"
+# Install the package in editable mode with proper path
+RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -e .
 
 # Expose the port
 EXPOSE 8000
 
\ No newline at end of file
 # Run the server with SSE transport
-CMD ["mcp-simple-tool", "--transport", "sse", "--port", "8000"] 
+CMD ["python", "-m", "mcp_simple_tool", "--transport", "sse", "--port", "8000"] 
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# Use Python 3.10 slim image as base
FROM python:3.10-slim

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install build dependencies and curl for healthcheck
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y \
    build-essential \
    curl \
    poppler-utils \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy project files
COPY . .

# Install the package in editable mode
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -e ".[dev]"

# Expose the port
EXPOSE 8000

# Run the server with SSE transport
CMD ["mcp-simple-tool", "--transport", "sse", "--port", "8000"]
